00095 template < File::TransferType transferType, File::TransferMode transferMode> int solveTransferFile(diet_profile_t* profile){
00096 
00097   string  srcUserKey, destUser, destMachineName,fileTransferSerialized;
00098   char* srcPath, *srcUser, *srcHost,*sessionKey, *dest, *errMsg = NULL, *optionsSerialized=NULL;
00099   std::string finishError ="";
00100 
00101   int mapperkey;
00102   std::string cmd = "";
00103 
00104   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile, 0), &sessionKey, NULL);
00105   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile, 1), &srcPath, NULL);
00106   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile, 2), &srcUser, NULL);
00107   diet_paramstring_get(diet_parameter(profile, 3), &srcHost, NULL);
00108   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile, 4), &dest, NULL);
00109   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile, 5), &optionsSerialized, NULL);
00110 
00111 
00112   std:: string destPath=File::extName(dest);
00113   std:: string destHost=File::extHost(dest);
00114   SessionServer sessionServer (sessionKey);
00115 
00116   try {
00117 
00118     //MAPPER CREATION
00119     Mapper *mapper = MapperRegistry::getInstance()->getMapper(FMSMAPPERNAME);
00120     
00121     if (transferMode==File::sync){
00122 
00123       if(transferType==File::copy){
00124         mapperkey = mapper->code("vishnu_copy_file");
00125       }
00126       if(transferType==File::move){
00127         mapperkey = mapper->code("vishnu_move_file");
00128       }
00129     }
00130     else{
00131     
00132       if(transferType==File::copy){
00133         mapperkey = mapper->code("vishnu_copy_async_file");
00134       }
00135       if(transferType==File::move){
00136         mapperkey = mapper->code("vishnu_move_async_file");
00137       }
00138 
00139     }
00140    
00141     mapper->code(srcPath, mapperkey);
00142     mapper->code(dest, mapperkey);
00143     mapper->code(optionsSerialized, mapperkey);
00144     cmd = mapper->finalize(mapperkey);
00145 
00146     // check the sessionKey
00147     sessionServer.check();
00148 
00149 
00150     UMS_Data::Machine_ptr machine = new UMS_Data::Machine();
00151     machine->setMachineId(destHost);
00152     MachineServer machineServer(machine);
00153 
00154     // check the machine
00155     machineServer.checkMachine();
00156 
00157     // get the machineName
00158     destMachineName = machineServer.getMachineName();
00159     delete machine;
00160 
00161     // get the acLogin
00162     destUser = UserServer(sessionServer).getUserAccountLogin(destHost);
00163 
00164 
00165     CpFileOptions* options_ptr= NULL;
00166     if(!vishnu::parseEmfObject(std::string(optionsSerialized), options_ptr) ) {
00167       throw SystemException(ERRCODE_INVDATA, "solve_Copy: CpFileOptions object is not well built");
00168     }
00169 
00170     int vishnuId=ServerFMS::getInstance()->getVishnuId(); 
00171 
00172     boost::shared_ptr<FileTransferServer> fileTransferServer(new FileTransferServer(sessionServer, srcHost, destHost, srcPath, destPath,vishnuId));
00173 
00174     // Perfor the transfer now
00175     if (transferMode==File::sync){
00176    
00177      if(transferType==File::copy){
00178         fileTransferServer->addCpThread(srcUser,srcHost,srcUserKey,destUser,destMachineName,*options_ptr);
00179       }
00180 
00181       if (transferType==File::move){
00182 
00183         fileTransferServer->addMvThread(srcUser,srcHost,srcUserKey,destUser,destMachineName,*options_ptr);
00184       }
00185     }
00186     else{
00187 
00188       if(transferType==File::copy){
00189         fileTransferServer->addCpAsyncThread(srcUser,srcHost,srcUserKey,destUser,destMachineName,*options_ptr);
00190       }
00191 
00192       if (transferType==File::move){
00193 
00194         fileTransferServer->addMvAsyncThread(srcUser,srcHost,srcUserKey,destUser,destMachineName,*options_ptr);
00195       }
00196 
00197       FMS_Data::FMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = FMS_Data::FMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00198 
00199       FMS_Data::FileTransfer_ptr fileTransfer=ecoreFactory->createFileTransfer();
00200 
00201       *fileTransfer= fileTransferServer->getFileTransfer();
00202 
00203 
00204       ::ecorecpp::serializer::serializer _ser;
00205 
00206       fileTransferSerialized =  _ser.serialize_str(const_cast<FMS_Data::FileTransfer_ptr>(fileTransfer));
00207 
00208 
00209       delete fileTransfer;
00210 
00211     }
00212     //To register the command
00213     sessionServer.finish(cmd, FMS, vishnu::CMDSUCCESS);
00214 
00215   } catch (VishnuException& err) {
00216     try {
00217       sessionServer.finish(cmd, FMS, vishnu::CMDFAILED);
00218     } catch (VishnuException& fe) {
00219       finishError =  fe.what();
00220       finishError +="\n";
00221     }
00222     err.appendMsgComp(finishError);
00223 
00224     errMsg = strdup(err.buildExceptionString().c_str());
00225   }
00226 
00227   if (errMsg==NULL) {
00228     errMsg = strdup("");
00229   }
00230 
00231   if (transferMode==File::sync){
00232 
00233     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile, 6), errMsg, DIET_VOLATILE);
00234   }
00235   else{
00236 
00237     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile, 6), strdup(fileTransferSerialized.c_str()),DIET_VOLATILE);
00238     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile, 7), errMsg, DIET_VOLATILE);
00239   }
00240 
00241   return 0;
00242 
00243 }

00440 template <class QueryParameters, class List, class QueryType>
00441 int
00442 solveGenerique(diet_profile_t* pb) {
00443 
00444   char* sessionKey = NULL;
00445   char* optionValueSerialized = NULL;
00446   std::string listSerialized = "";
00447   std::string empty = "";
00448   std::string errorInfo;
00449   int mapperkey;
00450   std::string cmd;
00451   std::string finishError ="";
00452 
00453   //IN Parameters
00454   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(pb,0), &sessionKey, NULL);
00455   diet_string_get(diet_parameter(pb,1), &optionValueSerialized, NULL);
00456 
00457   SessionServer sessionServer  = SessionServer(std::string(sessionKey));
00458 
00459   QueryParameters* options = NULL;
00460   List* list = NULL;
00461   
00462   
00463   try {
00464     //To parse the object serialized
00465     if(!parseEmfObject(std::string(optionValueSerialized), options)) {
00466       throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM);
00467     }
00468  
00469   
00470   QueryType query(options, sessionServer);
00471 
00472     //MAPPER CREATION
00473     Mapper *mapper = MapperRegistry::getInstance()->getMapper(FMSMAPPERNAME);
00474     mapperkey = mapper->code(query.getCommandName());
00475     mapper->code(std::string(optionValueSerialized), mapperkey);
00476     cmd = mapper->finalize(mapperkey);
00477 
00478     //  perform the query
00479 
00480     list = query.list();
00481 
00482     ::ecorecpp::serializer::serializer _ser;
00483 
00484     listSerialized =  _ser.serialize_str(const_cast<List*>(list));
00485 
00486     //OUT Parameter
00487     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(pb,2), strdup(listSerialized.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE);
00488     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(pb,3), strdup(empty.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE);
00489     sessionServer.finish(cmd, FMS, vishnu::CMDSUCCESS);
00490   } catch (VishnuException& e) {
00491     try {
00492       sessionServer.finish(cmd, FMS, vishnu::CMDFAILED);
00493     } catch (VishnuException& fe) {
00494       finishError =  fe.what();
00495       finishError +="\n";
00496     }
00497     e.appendMsgComp(finishError);
00498     errorInfo =  e.buildExceptionString();
00499     //OUT Parameter
00500     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(pb,2), strdup(listSerialized.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE);
00501     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(pb,3), strdup(errorInfo.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE);
00502   }
00503   delete options;
00504   delete list;
00505   return 0;
00506 }
